selectingWallet.recommendedWalletsPart2: on this platform. Please use or install one of the supported wallets to continue
selectingWallet.installWallet: You do not have any wallets installed that {app} supports, please use a supported wallet

connectingWallet.paragraph: Make sure to select all accounts that you want to grant access to.

actionRequired.heading: Action required in {wallet}
actionRequired.paragraph: Please switch the active account in your wallet.

transaction.txRequest: Your transaction is waiting for you to confirm
transaction.nsfFail: You have insufficient funds for this transaction
transaction.txUnderpriced: The gas price for your transaction is too low, try a higher gas price
transaction.txRepeat: This could be a repeat transaction
transaction.txAwaitingApproval: You have a previous transaction waiting for you to confirm
transaction.txConfirmReminder: Please confirm your transaction to continue
transaction.txSent: Your transaction has been sent to the network
transaction.txStallPending: Your transaction has stalled before it was sent, please try again
transaction.txStuck: Your transaction is stuck due to a nonce gap
transaction.txStallConfirmed: Your transaction has stalled and hasn't been confirmed
transaction.txSpeedUp: Your transaction has been sped up
transaction.txError: Oops something went wrong, please try again
transaction.txReplaceError: There was an error replacing your transaction, please try again

watched.txSpeedUp: Transaction for {formattedValue} {asset} {preposition} {counterpartyShortened} has been sped up
watched.txStuck: Your transaction is stuck due to a nonce gap
